description.value:
You gain three wizard at-will attack powers that have the bladespell keyword.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.Rz0Efp8eaZgjtmH2]{Dancing Fire}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.inA4qVB6y8gETJYC]{Dazzling Sunray}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.0kAKcmwhOVrPuig4]{Frost Bite}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.F2XUyf34qtgPpo5e]{Lightning Ring}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.iMfZRmpwD37NTvO5]{Shadow Sever}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.5drMZFCuYIaBRj2s]{Unseen Hand}
